DOC.brief_summary: Objectives The investigator present online application empower inform patient improve guideline adherence unexplained subfertility . Thereby investigator expect reduce overtreatment fertility care high quality care . Methods The investigator conduct prospective cohort study include couple diagnosis unexplained subfertility . Couples consult general practitioner unfulfilled child wish offer use FertiScreen . FertiScreen online application , patient ask question fertility problem ( ie menstrual cycle , age , duration child wish result Chlamydia Trachomatis antibody titre semen analysis ) . FertiScreen us validate prediction model Hunault calculate couple ' chance natural conception next twelve month . In addition , patient find links extra information concern subfertility . Couples initiate online consultation general practitioner gynaecologist , order discus result prognosis . When calculated prognosis spontaneous conception within one year > 30 % , tailor expectant management 6-12 month advise , benefit expect fertility treatment . Questionnaires sent patient well caregiver ( general practitioner , gynaecologist ) . These questionnaire focus use FertiScreen ( System Usability Scale ) different domain quality care ( effectiveness , cost-effectiveness , safety , patient-centredness ) . For latter , investigator use Hospital Anxiety Depression Scale Patient Centredness Questionnaire Infertility . In order able draw conclusion , investigator conduct baseline measurement among couple unexplained subfertility refer fertility clinic . Their data abstract medical record receive aforementioned questionnaire well ( except System Usability Scale ) . The investigator recruit couple present general practitioner Nijmegen area ( second line treatment consist one general hospital one academic hospital ) . To detect increase guideline adherence current 60 % 75 % power 80 % ( P < 0,05 ) , investigator need include 152 couple well measurement .
DOC.brief_title: FertiScreen : Online Application Improve Quality Fertility Care
